articles.title: Trump Indicted in Federal Classified Documents Case
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump was indicted by a federal grand jury in Miami on charges related to mishandling classified documents after leaving office, marking the first time a former U.S. president has faced federal criminal charges.

articles.title: Ukraine Launches Counteroffensive Against Russian Forces
articles.description: Ukrainian military forces have begun a long-anticipated counteroffensive in the eastern and southern regions, targeting Russian-occupied territories with the aim of reclaiming strategic areas and pushing back against Russian occupation.

articles.title: Apple Unveils Vision Pro Mixed Reality Headset
articles.description: At its Worldwide Developers Conference, Apple introduced the Vision Pro, a $3,499 mixed reality headset that blends virtual and augmented reality, marking the company's first major new product category since the Apple Watch.
